author: Ken Wolkerstorfer
comment: Generally happy with Groupon and the app however had an issue with a cell phone battery that my phone would not accept. It was from a second party supplier and could not get a refund or replacement. I tried multiple times and got nowhere. Money down the drain for a useless battery.

author: Lisa Mallinson
comment: This app really gave me hope because many beauty thing cost so much in comestic. This helped me get one worth 1500 for only 161 dollars. It's amazing. I finally had hope n my self esteem felt better ever since

author: Ericka Wood
comment: I recently purchased a Groupon for a massage and by the time I  scheduled my treatment it was fraudulently redeemed by another person. Groupon was unwilling to help I  any way and the the spa,  Spavia, was unwilling to help. The refused to refund, credit, or unredeem the voucher. Very disappointed in the customer service. Groupon is not secure and others have access to your information.

author: Samia I.
comment: I love this app has great deals. What I hate is that all the travel discounts are flying out of US destinations in US dollar on Groupon Canada, why do we never get the opportunity for these deals?? Super annoying if it doesn't fly out of my country or in CND dollars then I don't want to see it, remove it from Groupon Canada.

author: Bryan Tanner
comment: Groupon bottom line: great for me, not great for small companies who need to make a living. Tip your small business owners folks! They lose money on Groupon. Ya, it is advertising but how often a Groupon purchaser becomes a regular customer varies greatly and is somewhat low in general.

author: Andrea Hanna
comment: I love Groupon. I use it for experiences as opposed to buying goods, which I think is where some people have had negative experiences. After all, Groupon is simply advertising the goods on offer from other sellers so if there's a problem with that item they can't do much.   I use Groupon instead to buy fitness classes and memberships and local things to do. I've got climbing memberships and belay certifications, unlimited gym memberships, hair cuts, manicures and pedicures, aerial silks classes and belly dancing classes with this app. As a grad student I love it because I live on a tight stipend and it allows to me to access services I wouldn't otherwise be able to afford. Moreover, because it's affordable I can try new things and find out about local events I wouldn't otherwise have known about.

author: Julianna Smith
comment: Scammed...i ordered 2 kinds of Dolce and Gabbana perfumes and they are not the real thing!! I've bought these before and these are cheap knock offs!! I am so mad

author: Cheryl Espinoza
comment: I think I should be able to return an item that does not fit.  I was actually out of the country and when I received the items the didn't fit. I'm not happy with the policy I should be refunded cuz it was not my fault manufacturer sizes were inaccurate

author: DeKaia Goss
comment: Deals on places to go, tours, etc have all been good so far. But I purchased athletic leggings in a 4 pack that is coming undone along the seams.
Ive received tons of amazing deals. Be 100% on what you would like to order because reaching out or receiving a reply from groupon is nearly impossible. Overall experience has been positive one.

author: SLY ness
comment: I paid for a voucher and it says that I must make a booking. But the joke is they say they can't find my purchase, so I can't book a date.what a joke

author: Ronisha Robinson
comment: Convenient, fast, and affordable! I've never had a problem with casing in any deals. Love the percentage back feature for trying new restaurants! Money goes back on the card immediately. Love it!

author: Jose Olivares
comment: So far everything i have ordered from here comes in as described. English instructions and just as described. Which I have mentioned twice because sometimes with some sites you don't get that.
I love almost everything about this app including ease of use. My only gripe is not being able to fully view all the comments on a merchant. Please fix this and you will have my 5 star rating!

author: j cooper
comment: Unbelievably bad customer service. If you ever have a problem with them or an item you have purchased, good luck trying to get it replaced or even have your concern dealt with. Been waiting well over a month for my issue to be sorted and it's still ongoing.

author: Taz Thomas
comment: Great app! Found cheap as chips deals on things i have been saying ive wanted to do for years. Recomend to all humans!

author: Jean Sparks
comment: Never had a problem using Groupon for things to do, activities, etc.  As far as buying goods I get a little cautious. You get what you pay for...

author: b1ack c0wboy
comment: Only problem I have is that it doesn't say when something is about to expire but otherwise good

author: Barbie Roberts
comment: Absolutely love Groupon. It's so easy to navigate and deals are awesome

author: Tammy Blackwell
comment: It's first time I used app well c if I get what I paid for cause I really have no idea how this works

author: Patricia Pensyl
comment: I have ordered several things through here over the years. I haven't had a complaint on any of them except for one.

author: Marie Clark
comment: I lost my debit card,and someone used it at Groupon what don't understand is how they was able to do that,Groupon didn't ask them any questions,like,what's the name on card,what the address that the card belongs to,or the four digits of your social security number,they ask them nothing,and the spent $90 off my card,I Just don't understand that,( I know it was my fault I lost my card)you would think with a popular company as Groupon they would be more professional,to all of you that shop from here,check your account balance Because if there letting anyone order merchandise without asking them any questions,then they might be doing other things.....thank you ,Marie Clark.

author: Cute Kurzy Kids
comment: Perfect customer service, never had a problem they couldn't instantly solve and never had problems I didn't cause myself and they still were willing to help me

author: Crystal Walton
comment: I ordered one thing it seems to be ok.

author: Bettyjo Sawyer
comment: I love all the amazing deals I get through groupon

author: Katelyn McDonald
comment: I use this mostly for our local trampoline park. My coupon expired yesterday and Groupon gave me my whole credit back on I had paid which was great!

author: Nick M.
comment: Thank you Tiffany Haddish!!!! I absolutely LOVE Groupon. So many amazing deals I have been missing out on. Not anymore. Great Deals, Great App, Great spokeswoman! She readyyy! Yassss!

author: Annie Rowley
comment: Before I go anywhere do anything buy anything I go to Groupon usually find a deal.
I have bought serverall item and have enjoy the price

author: Jennifer Peraza
comment: its awesome! but make sure you read & understand the fine print info.

author: Kunal Khairnar
comment: Great app tons of savings, be sure to pick up the right deal.

author: Simon Fraser
comment: Bought a 50% discount on priority pass. Turns out to be 35%. Can't leave review to warn others

author: Paula RD
comment: I really like this app but have sometimes had problems downloading it?
Great shopping place, get lost shopping on it for hours. Some amazing bargains too.

author: sammie munasser
comment: My manager recommended it for dog food etc.. wayyy cheaper then big box stores .love u group on 😂

author: Lee Robert
comment: This app is new BFF

author: John Elias
comment: You wont find cheaper or better value.elsewear. JE.

author: Kelsey Holm
comment: Good deals but some electronics are hard to return if no good. Watch out everyone!

author: Sherry O'Fallon Dunston
comment: I found lots of wonderful prices, but just decided to try ordering one item. Ordering was fast & easy. So far love it.

author: Mindy de Bruyn
comment: Great service and great deals.
